description:
This season revolves around Chang`an City in the King`s Continent. It starts with the newcomer Yun Ying joining the Dali Temple. She and Li Yuanfang work together to carry out tasks and gradually uncover the mystery of the Yaotian Organization. Although the members of the Dali Temple and the Yaotian Organization belong to different camps, they are all guarding Chang`an in their own way and pursuing justice in their hearts.
source: bgm.tv\googletranslate

BAIDU_BAIKE: 是王者啊？之牡丹香幽大理寺

titles.title: Shi Wangzhe A? Di 4 Ji: Mudan Xiang You Dali Si
是王者啊? 第4季 牡丹香幽大理寺
